entry.title: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in CreedAlly Bulk Featured Image
entry.content:
é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2m2x-qh8q-wgqq

CVSS è¯„åˆ†ï¼š 9.1

å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ï¼š

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-28951

  • https://patchstack.com/database/wordpress/plugin/bulk-featured-image/vulnerability/wordpress-bulk-featured-image-plugin-1-2-1-arbitrary-file-upload-vulnerability?_s_id=cve

æè¿°ï¼š

Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in CreedAlly Bulk Featured Image allows Upload a Web Shell to a Web Server. This issue affects Bulk Featured Image: from n/a through 1.2.1.

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š RevPi WebStatus

å½±å“ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š â‰¤ v2.4.5

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/cyberre124/CVE-2025-41646---Critical-Authentication-Bypass-

ç±»å‹ï¼š CVE-2025:github search

ä»“åº“æ–‡ä»¶

  • Exploit.py
  • README.md

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

CVE-2025-41646â€”Critical-Authentication-Bypass-

CVE-2025-41646 - Critical Authentication bypass

ğŸ”“ CVE-2025-41646 - RevPi WebStatus Authentication Bypass PoC

A critical authentication bypass vulnerability (CVE-2025-41646) in RevPi WebStatus â‰¤ v2.4.5 allows an attacker to log in as admin without valid credentials due to weak type comparison logic (== vs ===).

ğŸ“Œ Affected

  • RevPi WebStatus v2.4.5 and below
  • Industrial/OT systems running on Raspbian with Apache

ğŸ’¥ Exploitation

Send a login request with:

{  "mode": "LOGIN",  "username": "admin",  "hashcode": true}
